item.text: This site contains information, tutorials, and practical examples that help you understand how to use and work with [[Smallest Federated Wiki]] in the [[Viral Academy]].

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.
item.text: Here we link you directly to the things you must be do/be able to do before the March Happening, in a nice linear style.
item.title: Things You Must Do
